function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate messaging about the impact of COVID-19 on conservation efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on large visitor numbers for funding sustainable tourism","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of new technologies and techniques for public engagement, tourism, and research","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opportunity for renewed emphasis on in-country partnerships and collaboration due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Withdrawal of researchers and practitioners from conservation sites due to travel restrictions, leading to the cancellation or postponement of research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear long-term vision affecting the continuity of conservation action and messaging post-pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inter-species disease transmission and risk within Cantanhez National Park","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of cancelled field trips, meetings, and networking opportunities on conservation biases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of in-person engagement mechanisms leading to decline in community trust and participation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of disease transmission leading to extermination of local populations of species","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in monitoring data due to closures and social distancing restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced funding and income for conservation activities and local communities","category":"Society ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Biodiversity conservation deprioritized post-pandemic","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of delayed projects and funding cuts","category":"Society ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for holistic approaches to address zoonotic transmission and biodiversity loss","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Withdrawal of conservation funding due to conflict or social-political shifts","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on tourism and visitor revenue for financing conservation activities","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chronic underfunding of conservation programs and protected areas","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced capacity and increased costs of implementing safety procedures may lead to inadequate conservation activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less urgent tasks such as research projects and long-term monitoring are deprioritized during the pandemic, leading to gaps in data and understanding of conservation needs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of militarized conservation methods post-pandemic may have severe societal and psychological repercussions, particularly for communities previously traumatized by war","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of income from tourism impacting biodiversity and increasing reliance on natural resources","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of incentives to conserve wildlife and habitats central to tourism-based industries","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Danger and difficulty of accessing areas in warfare and disaster zones","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased hunting pressure and shifts in trading patterns leading to enhanced trading of endangered species","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease transmission between wildlife and domestic animals impacting local incomes and livelihoods","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sudden and sustained decline in tourist numbers impacting local revenue and livelihoods","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of zoonotic diseases from wildlife to domestic animals or human communities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on livelihoods and food security leading to increased exploitation of wildlife and habitats","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disturbances and reduction in protection efforts leading to illegal trafficking of wildlife","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission between wild and domestic animal or human populations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pollutants spread by aquatic and airborne pathways","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Military infrastructure, defoliation, wildlife exploitation, and trade in conflict areas","category":"Society ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential inter-species transmission of novel coronavirus in shared landscapes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of funds for conservation areas due to temporary cessation of international tourism","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on community engagement events and fundraising for conservation projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Habitat degradation and fragmentation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of non-covid-19 perturbations on conservation outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex conservation outcomes of non-covid-19 perturbations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on author expertise may introduce bias in case study selection","category":"Society ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unverified anticipated outcomes may lead to inaccurate conclusions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited representation of conservation settings and cultures in case study selection","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The focus on perturbations with major social, political, economic, and/or ecological impacts may include contagious diseases like zoonotic disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Premature death of conservationists due to COVID-19","category":"Society ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental, economic, and societal changes","category":"Society ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19,
